title: Allow a player to Self Register
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate Player Pin Registration widget
3. Click Edit
custom_expected:
1. BOC dasboard should be displayed
2. Player Pin Registration widget should be present
3. By clicking edit the widget should go into edit mode. The following buttons should now be presented:
- Save
- Send Email
- Add Row
- Cancel

title: Add multiple new players and create PINS
custom_steps:
Pre-requisite: Run Test Case Pin_Gen_001

1. Click Add Row five times 
2. Add five new Players
Note: DOB needs to be AFTER 9/1/1995
3. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Five new rows should be added, with fields visible under each column. These fields should be editable.
2. Fields should be editable. Data should appear correctly.
3. Players should be added successfully and the PIN numbers populated. The PINs should be unqiue.

title: Verify I can log into system
custom_steps:
1. Log in Self Registration Site
2. Enter PIN and Log In
custom_expected:
1. Self registration is displayed, with one field to enter their PIN and a Login button
2. Upon successful login player will redirected to player submission form. The current status of the form should "Not Yet Submitted" and a blank form for the player to fill in should be visible.

title: Verify that form is "INCOMPLETE" but still editable after
custom_steps:
Pre-requisite: Run Test Case Self_Reg_023

1. Fill out the following fields:
- First Name
- Last Name
- Home Country
- Birth Date
- Birth Country
2. Click Submit
3. Click Back
4. Log out
custom_expected:
1. All fields should populated correctly.
2. Verify that user is prompted with an error indicating that they have failed to submit a complete profile. A list of ALL requried fileds that are not filled in will be listed.
3. Clicking back on the error blocker should, (if the incomplete profile meets the minimum field threshold) submit the profile to BOC. It should appear in the BOC's Registration Admin widget with a Registration Status of "Incomplete" and the current status of the form will say "Incomplete". 
4. Player should be logged out and returned to Login page

title: So that it can be sent to BOC for verification
custom_preconds: Pin created for player by BOC
custom_steps:
1. Enter Pin and click login 
2. Fill out all required fields
3. Click Submit
4. Log Out
custom_expected:
1. Player is brought to profile page in edit mode
2. Fields work as expected 
3. A notification should display to user to say their form has been submitted. This Status on the form should now be "pending BOC review". The player should not be able to edit the form. It should be displayed in read only mode.
4. Player should be logged out and redirected to Log In page

title: Open the Help Page
custom_steps:
1. Click on the Help Link
2. Check Help page and review order
custom_expected:
1.Verify the Help page
2.Verify order of New Player Registration Instructions, Contact Information, and Email Us.

title: Verify player submission form updates to Correction Needed
custom_preconds: Player has self registered and submitted to BOC for review
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate Registration Admin widget
3. Find Self Reg Player
4. Open Player profile
5. Click Edit
6. Locate Registration Reviews section
7. Select any Correction-Needed options for the first review
8. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. BOC dashboard should be displayed
2. Registration Admin widget should be visible
3. The Self Reg player should be visible in the list
4. Player profile should be opened in read only mode. Data from Self Registration form should have been populated in to the profile.
5. Profile should go into edit mode
6. Registration Reviews section should be visible now in edit mode.
7. There should be a list of options to choose from, user should be able to select one of the correction needed statements.
8. Profile status should be updated to "Correction-Needed" and an Email should be generated and sent to the Player

title: Verify that all elements are translated correctly
custom_steps:
1. Log in Self Registration Site 
2. Enter PIN and Log In
3. Hover Language and select Spanish
custom_expected:
1. Self registration is displayed, with one field to enter their PIN and a Login button
2. Upon successful login player will redirected to player submission form.
3. The site should be reloaded in Spanish

title: Check the contents of the email is correct (English)
custom_steps:
Pre-requisite: Self_Reg_018

1. Log in to Email, find and open email
2. Verify contents of email
custom_expected:
1. Email should have been sent to the player
2. Email should have the following contents and populated in the relevant places with the Player Data:

Subject: Correction Needed √ê Major League Baseball (MLB) International Prospect Registration

Dear %firstName %lastName, 

Your registration with Major League Baseball has been reviewed but cannot be verified by MLB due to the following reason: %CorrectionNeededComments.

Please enter display player's unique URL here and sign in using the pin number Player's unique Pin in order to correct your registration profile and re-submit it for review by MLB.

Your registration will not be complete until the necessary corrections are made and the profile is verified by an MLB employee. If your registration is verified, a confirmation email will be sent to the provided email address. If your registration still cannot be verified then an email will be sent to the provided email address with instructions on how to correct your registration profile. 

If you do not receive a confirmation email for your re-submitted registration, or if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at registration@mlb.com or (809) 518-2233.
